name: io.github.cr7258/elasticsearch-mcp-server
description: MCP server for interacting with Elasticsearch

environmentVariables.name: ELASTICSEARCH_HOSTS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of Elasticsearch hosts (e.g., https://localhost:9200)

environmentVariables.name: ELASTICSEARCH_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: API key for Elasticsearch or Elastic Cloud authentication (recommended)

environmentVariables.name: ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME
environmentVariables.description: Username for basic authentication (alternative to API key)

environmentVariables.name: ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
environmentVariables.description: Password for basic authentication (used with ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME)
